item.title: The Doctrine of Christ
item.description:
The Doctrine of Christ by undefined Brian K. Ashton, Second Counselor in the Sunday School General Presidency given in Session 6 of 186th Semiannual General Conference on Fri Sep 30 2016
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: undefined Brian K. Ashton, Second Counselor in the Sunday School General Presidency
